item.title: Clustering virtual machines with rgmanager and clusvcadm
item.description: This could be a post detailing how to host clustered virtual machines with rgmanager and clusvcadm, but that is a longer story and there is much work to do. For now, I will give you a short version including an informative “gotcha”. With my cluster up and running, I added a virtual machine entry to my cluster.conf: <vm name="test1" domain="somedomain" path="/shared/vm/" autostart="0" exclusive="0" recovery="restart" use_virsh="1" /> This goes inside the block.
